snippet.title: Undusted: Letters from the Past - Official Trailer | Ghouls 4 Games
snippet.description:
Undusted: Letters from the Past is a game where you restore long-neglected items to their original condition. Explore various objects placed in each stage and uncover the stories associated with them. Check out the trailer for Undusted: Letters from the Past to see gameplay as cameras, cassette players, and more get cleaned up. Undusted: Letters from the Past will be available on PC.


A girl who gave up her long-held dreams returns to her home in the countryside. In the process of repairing the abandoned and broken house, she cleans and discovers valuable items that were left behind. What memories will she uncover during this journey?
